title: Ticket #893: Require GRIDFTP_URL_BASE for CREAM jobs
description:
For the current CREAM support in Condor-G, we ask the CREAM server to perform the file staging via gridftp. The CREAM API doesn't provide a way to specify what DN to expect for gridftp transfers, so the client machine must have a gridftp server with a host certificate. This means Condor-G's trick of starting a gridftp server with the user's credential won't work, and GRIDFTP_URL_BASE must be set.

The gridmanager should check whether GRIDFTP_URL_BASE is set and put CREAM jobs on hold if it isn't.
